summary: Tools for the archer, including tracer shots, auto switch to FPV, and sights tuning.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#F5C908][b]Tools for the Expert Archer[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4]Adds handy capabilities every archer can use[/size][/center]

[size=5][color=#F5C908]Featured Videos[/color][/size]
[youtube]3A1cXV1A_N4[/youtube] [youtube]VdAmYbjz7PE[/youtube]


[color=#F5C908][heading]Tracer Shot[/heading][/color]
[color=green]Now works with crossbows too![/color]
[list]
[*]Makes your projectiles glow when shot
[*]Better aiming for long shots
[*]Easier to find your arrows
[*]Optional bright light in flight
[*]Optionally make shots hum like nirnroot
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Archery Focus[/heading][/color]
[color=green]Now works with crossbows too![/color]
[list]
[*]Automatically switch to first person view whenever you pull a bowstring.
[*]Optionally return to third person view on sheath and/or when hit in melee
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Zero In[/heading][/color][b][color=green]New!![/color][/b]
[list]
[*]Interactively adjust your sights for super accurate shots.
[*]Separate sighting for bows and crossbows in both first and third person perspective.
[*]Settings stay with your game. No need to fuss with INI files ever again.
[*]Tune your sights for any range.
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Requirements[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE 1.7+[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url]
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Compatibility[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]Works with all bows. Tracer works also with crossbows.
[*]Fully compatible with DLC and 3rd party mods.
[*]Works with 3rd party weapons.
[*]No known conflicts with any other mod. Any load order works.
[*]Works with Requiem and PerMa.
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Special Notes[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]This mod consolidates functionality from Jaxonz Archery Focus and Jaxonz Archery Perks and depricates those mods. If upgrading, it is recommended that you clean your save game with with [url=../52363]Save game script cleaner[/url] by Hadoram to purge any orphaned scripts/objects.
[*]Archery Util is also part of [url=../60910]Jaxonz Utilities[/url]. You don't need both.
[/list]

Check out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10674107/?tb=mods]Other Great Mods[/url] from Jaxonz

All Jaxonz mods are professionally coded for stability and high quality.
author: Jaxonz

files.name: Jaxonz Archery Util
files.changelogHtml: Added Zero In function that lets you interactively tune your sights.

files.name: Jaxonz Archery Util
files.changelogHtml: All tools now work equally well with crossbows!

files.name: Jaxonz Archery Util
files.changelogHtml: Fixed script error that could cause annoying messages.

files.name: Jaxonz Archery Util
files.changelogHtml:
Rewrote Zero In routine to use states, simplifying code and improving reliability.
Made second shot of Zero In process glow green. Updated instructions.
